channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 17:36 Return the threat of Artobhstil to the Chervonohrigor Territorial Community.
item.description: 🟢 17:36 Return the threat of Artobhstil to the Chervonohrigor Territorial Community. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 15:52 Drawing of anxiety in Kharkiv region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lapetskaya Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 15:52 Drawing of anxiety in Kharkiv region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lapetskaya Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv_.
